mapper.select: select class_seq , class_name , in_dtm from classBoard where delete_yn = 'N' order by in_dtm desc

select cb.class_name , cb.class_seq , cb.class_content , cb.in_id , cb.in_dtm , group_concat(c.word_seq) word_seq from classBoard cb left outer join contain c on cb.class_seq = c.class_seq where c.class_seq = #{class_seq} group by c.class_seq
